reviews.review:
This movie was so damn epic that I've seen it 12x's straight, I was so ingrained into the action and story and I know everybody else was, it was definitely better than the 1st 2 and I've never heard so much hype and anticipation for this movie since The Dark Knight.

I know everybody's gonna tell me that The Dark Knight still stands as the greatest of all time, But The Dark Knight didn't even make 1.8 billion, that's nearly 2 billion worldwide and now 10 years later, The MCU's still going strong and it's not gonna letting up anytime soon.

R.I.P. DCEU, you got nothing on The MCU.

Long Live The Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Just awesome. Thanos is a BMF

A lot could have gone wrong with "Avengers:  Infinity War" because it was 10 years of work and world-building, a ridiculously massive production, and, all-in-all, it was a HUGE gamble-and this is from a company that took B- and C-list superheroes and took a chance on them and made they household names.  Ultimately, like how Marvel Studios took a risk and exposed audiences to a talking raccoon and tree and made them adored by the masses, "Infinity War" proved to be another win for the MCU.  The story is epic in scope and exciting in nature, the Russo brothers do a tremendous job of being able to balance all the plot threads and numerous characters, the action is very satisfying, the humor is hysterical, the performances are fantastic (especially Josh Brolin as Thanos) and the movie delivers some great heart and drama.  My only complaints involve the minions of Thanos are sorta underdeveloped and I would have liked to see more of them and some scenes with Scarlet Witch and Vision are a little slow and borderline boring.  However, these two issues didn't stop me from absolutely loving this film and finding it to be something that delivered on what it promised and then went beyond that.  Here's to 10 more years of the MCU!

Hello!  My name is Rev. Ron and if you feel like checking out more of my reviews (including a more in-depth look at "Avengers:  Infinity War") you can visit my blog at RevRonMovies.BlogSpot.com.  Also, if the mood strikes, you can follow me on Twitter (@RevRonster).  Thanks!

Avengers Infinity War brings the past ten years of Marvel movies into one. With large fight scenes and many things at stake, Infinity War is able to fulfill everything it was meant to be and setups a new Marvel Universe, one without Iron Man or Captain America. I would highly recommend to any superhero film.
Absolutely amazing love the action, comedy, and the sadness in this film. Best movie of all time in my opinion.

Excellent film. Flowed very nicely especially even more when I was 8 hours in line before sitting down. The film does have a lot of residual feelings that carry over the next couple days after initial watch. In my opinion, those are the best kinds of film in today's world.

My biggest issues were plot related. Balancing plot and character development is a tricky thing, especially with as many moving parts this movie had and I feel they sacrificed the plot for the character interactions.  on't get me wrong, the interactions between the characters were good, but if they wanted me to feel like I could relate with the main villain, they failed.  Nowhere in the movie did you get to see Thanos's pain and see where he was coming from.  He was more then willing to talk about it throughout the whole movie, but talk is cheap and if you want the audience to connect with the villain, they have to see it.  Also there were some obvious plot points that were brought up in earlier Marvel movies that should have been brought forward for this movie that were not.  I made it about half-way through the movie before my suspension of disbelieving was shattered and the rest of the movie went down hill after that.  i was greatly disappointed with what i got, especially with 10 years of hype built up and I walked out of the theater wanting my money back.
I really liked this movie. I think the Russo brothers handled all there characters really well
greatest villian we have seen at marvel yet. everything about this film was perfect
deseves a toaster and carton of milk
